summary: A late game sword you can obtain by killing Paarthurnax.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Ygfbv\'s Blackire
Version: 1.4
Date: 2/8/2012
Category: Weapons
Author(s): Ygfbv 
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8211

Description
===========
This is a sword you can wrench from the corpse of Paarthurnax, assuming you go with the Blades path in the main quest. 

Location
========
Paarthurnax\'s body. If you already killed him, you\'ll have to use the console to get the sword.

Details
=======
It has an enhanced version of the dragon slaying enchantment and also has souptrap for 15s. Somewhat better than Daedric, too...and it looks cool! 

Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
4. Start the Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file.

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

\\Skyrim\\Data\\Ygfbv\'s Blackire.ESP
\\Skyrim\\Data\\Ygfbv\'s Blackire.BSA




Known Issues or Bugs
====================
I\'m not aware of any bugs. 

History
=======
1.4, 2/10/2012 - Fixed bug where it was overwriting the glass sword\'s 1st person texture. Added a tempering recipe, too. You can also unenchant it! 
1.3, 2/8/2012 - Now has unlimited charges. :D
1.2, 2/8/2012 - Changed weapon description in-game.
1.0, 2/7/2012 - Initial release..

Contact
=======
You can find me on the Nexus sites as Ygfbv.

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the texture that this is based upon.
Thanks to Skyrim Nexus for being the one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
GIMP - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=14920
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that 
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod. I would also like
to know what mods are including my work.
author: ygfbv
